928e42f4-6373-4035-99e6-c7e400ad35d8.description: The Project Management certificate is a structured sequence of courses that prepares students for a career in the planning and business fields. Students apply project management practices such as project initiation, planning and scheduling; project cost management; and project risk management to achieve success in a wide variety of fields, including marketing, financial services, information technology, government, construction, and more.
928e42f4-6373-4035-99e6-c7e400ad35d8.name: Project Management

issuer.summary: issued by Penn State Great Valley School of Professional Studies

entity.name: Penn State Great Valley School of Professional Studies

badge_template_activities.title: A Penn State Great Valley certificate is awarded upon completion of the four required courses. The Pennsylvania State University is a Project Management Institute (PMI)® Authorized Training Partner (A.T.P) and students will earn 84 PDUs (Professional Development Units) when completing the four courses, which can be applied to hours needed to apply and sit for the PMP exam.
Explore badge opportunities associated with earned professional development certificates.

13a69739-83e2-47b1-bf1d-bb5e53e8c4b7.description: The Leadership Development certificate prepares students to define aspects of leadership and the relationship to concepts, theories, and models. Students explore real-life scenarios in the workplace and business community.
13a69739-83e2-47b1-bf1d-bb5e53e8c4b7.name: Leadership Development

5dd08749-6d13-4036-a114-bc1b00075c4e.description: An Integrated Digital Marketing certificate equips students with the necessary skills to create high-value material, identify opportunities in the digital realm, and track campaign performance. Students will delve into personas, SEO, SEM, digital marketing, email, website, and social media strategies that will help professionals engage with their customers, drive sales, and boost buy-in from an executive team.
5dd08749-6d13-4036-a114-bc1b00075c4e.name: Integrated Digital Marketing

Explore badge opportunities associated with earned professional development certificates.

2ed1050a-d5d1-47b1-be3d-d3c284d3c78d.description: The Lean Six Sigma certification prepares students to improve production processes, employee engagement, lean scheduling, and business justification analysis methods; identify risks; eliminate waste and defects by removing them; and guarantee quality while reducing overall costs and increasing profit margins. Earners complete an ongoing Lean Six Sigma project that directly impacts their organization.
2ed1050a-d5d1-47b1-be3d-d3c284d3c78d.name: Lean Six Sigma

issuer.summary: issued by Penn State Great Valley School of Professional Studies

entity.name: Penn State Great Valley School of Professional Studies

badge_template_activities.title: he Lean Six Sigma Professional certification blends classroom experience with hands-on activities. A Penn State certification is awarded upon completion of all three courses, earning students 6.3 Continuing Education Credits (CEUs).
Explore badge opportunities associated with earned professional development certificates.

48142536-9652-4028-b044-dad8394fa9ae.description: The Logistics and Operations Management certificate familiarizes students with the Supply Chain Operations Reference (SCOR) model through classroom instruction and hands-on, real-world applications. Earners gain a holistic introduction to both the supply and demand chains, as well as inventory management that help them to understand the concepts that connect manufacturers, markets, suppliers, warehouses, retailers, and customers, while creating net value and avoiding risk.
48142536-9652-4028-b044-dad8394fa9ae.name: Logistics & Operations Management

issuer.summary: issued by Penn State Great Valley School of Professional Studies

entity.name: Penn State Great Valley School of Professional Studies

badge_template_activities.title: The Logistics and Operations Management certificate will be awarded upon successful completion of the three required courses, earning students 6.3 Continuing Education Credits (CEUs).
Explore badge opportunities associated with earned professional development certificates.

084f23f1-dcc2-41ee-8349-1c000f3fd548.description: The Cyber Security certificate provides students with hands-on, foundational knowledge of vital cyber aspects, including operations, laws, and policies. It also provides students with a foundation in cyber risk management, which is aligned with the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST), the assessment of security and privacy controls in information systems and organizations. The program will also help prepare students to sit for the CISSP exam.
084f23f1-dcc2-41ee-8349-1c000f3fd548.name: Cyber Security

issuer.summary: issued by Penn State Great Valley School of Professional Studies

entity.name: Penn State Great Valley School of Professional Studies

badge_template_activities.title: The Cyber Security certificate will be awarded upon successful completion of the three required courses, awarding students with 3.6 Continuing Education Credits (CEU's).
Explore badge opportunities associated with earned professional development certificates.

b2c81411-971a-46ff-aff5-93f061201c99.description: The Cyber Threat Analytics and Prevention graduate certificate prepares earners to understand diverse and global cyberattacks, cyber laws and regulations, vulnerabilities, threats, and surveillance systems, while gaining certain fundamental skills to plan, prevent, protect, detect, analyze, respond, mitigate, and recover from threats and attacks in a sophisticated and large-scale basis.
b2c81411-971a-46ff-aff5-93f061201c99.name: Cyber Threat Analytics and Prevention

issuer.summary: issued by Penn State Great Valley School of Professional Studies

entity.name: Penn State Great Valley School of Professional Studies

badge_template_activities.title: The Graduate Certificate in Cyber Threat Analytics and Prevention will be awarded upon successful completion of the 12-credit curriculum.
Explore badge opportunities with earned certificates.

523f21d8-8e59-4f8c-b932-f99c0c5ac795.description: The Penn State Six Sigma Green Belt professional certification provides students with both the statistical and analytical tools for continuous change, while integrating the key practices of collaboration, alignment, enrolling key stakeholders, and other means to make innovation stick. Depending upon the depth and duration of this course, this is an introduction to or fully complementary to the PSU Great Valley LSS certificate program.
523f21d8-8e59-4f8c-b932-f99c0c5ac795.name: Six Sigma Green Belt

issuer.summary: issued by Penn State Great Valley School of Professional Studies

entity.name: Penn State Great Valley School of Professional Studies

badge_template_activities.title: This two-module Six Sigma Green Belt Certification course blends classroom experience with hands-on activities. A Penn State certification is awarded upon completion of both modules and after passing the comprehensive certification exam. Students also earn 4.2 Continuing Education Credits (CEUs).

skills.name: Communicating, collaborating, and enrolling support for LSS projects
Dealing with difficult process and people challenges
Working with a real-world change project to make successful change

5c37048b-6be4-4436-b12f-fe6ff3a642eb.description: The Human Resource Management graduate certificate prepares earners to integrate human resource (HR) strategies and practices with organizational strategies to improve business performance and employee relations. Earners delve into key concepts including workforce planning, forecasting, and adjustment; ethics, diversity, and employment law; talent recruitment and performance management; compensation strategy and incentives; risk management; and employee relations.

961a946d-7d6e-40ca-a74f-68aab89e293b.description: The Data Analytics graduate certificate prepares earners to apply data analytics techniques to large data sets to support data-driven decisions across a wide variety of domains.

89cf396c-bd13-434f-b384-eb65b9d3b0c6.description: The Entrepreneurship & New Ventures graduate certificate prepares earners to conceptualize and develop new business ventures, products, and services to take to market. Earners engage in a creative process including opportunity recognition, idea generation and selection, the lean start-up process, and business plan development.

b01e6420-fbb2-4dd6-8c6c-0a027a818a74.description: The Sustainability & Social Impact graduate certificate helps earners manage new or existing sustainable practices. Earners gain a competitive advantage by understanding how adopting the triple bottom line approach can enhance earners organization’s long-term viability.

18029100-ee73-48b0-b093-a62063aa1052.description: The Leading in Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion graduate certificate develops earners’ knowledge and skills in fostering DEI and an inclusive culture in organizations. Earners learn how to make mindful and ethical decisions; support and reinforce positive, sustainable change; and build strong business case initiatives to create, engage, and measure an inclusive workplace through communication, mentorship, hiring practices, executive level support, listening, career management, and training.

f1536323-a66b-4d68-b2ff-61671142ec07.description: The Quantitative Business Essentials graduate certificate provides earners with the knowledge and skills necessary to become more efficient and effective managers and decision-makers. Earners learn cutting edge data-driven skills in essential areas, including interpreting reports, assessing a company’s position from its financial statements, calculating a project’s capital cost, evaluating risk and return trade-offs, and optimizing supply chain and logistics operations.

fff20e5d-c53b-47d4-a352-7aa6c35b76c6.description: The Essentials in Strategic Leadership certificate prepares students to define aspects of leadership and explore the relationship to concepts, theories, and models both in class and in real-life scenarios in the workplace.

dd451eb6-8524-461a-a275-8589876f672b.description: The Financial Accounting graduate certificate prepares earners to pursue further graduate accounting education and take the CPA exam. Topics covered are relevant to CPA licensure and include tax planning, commercial transactions, ethics, accounting information systems, and government and not-for-profit accounting.

58179b33-ed84-4311-9369-6caa6f8e178b.description: The Fundamentals of Leadership graduate certificate prepares earners to craft the building blocks of leadership. The program covers character strength-based leadership development; full range leadership development; and the effectiveness of authentic, ethical, and creative leadership. Earners finish the certificate ready to become a transformational leader who cultivates human sustainability and flourishing organizations.
58179b33-ed84-4311-9369-6caa6f8e178b.name: Fundamentals of Leadership

a64afd35-3649-4e29-9f46-9e5819258e80.description: Students adopt a comparative management approach as they review websites and other communications, tour facilities, and interview business leaders. They examine sustainable business practices, innovation, and the design of work in different types of organizations across cultures. As a result of these immersive activities, students articulate how culture shapes business and leadership practices in global contexts.

issuer.summary: issued by Penn State Great Valley School of Professional Studies

e63687f5-eb61-4042-a063-49d9c2b0ce6e.description: The Management Accounting graduate certificate prepares earners to use timely managerial accounting information to facilitate decision making for business owners, managers, and employees.

7109c1f7-3d56-4f58-8fff-93edfc9ef62b.description: The Management Essentials graduate certificate provides earners with the fundamental business skills necessary to grow and thrive in today's business world, including people and team management, business development, and strategic decision making.
